abstract: Brazilian designer Sergio Rodrigues opens home furnishings store Espasso Sergio Rodrigues in TriBeCA neighborhood of New York City.
snippet: The Brazilian designer is opening his first United States store in more than 40 years.
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian designer is opening his first United States store in more than 40 years.

headline.main: A Sergio Rodrigues Shop Opens in New York
headline.print_headline: At 84, a Brazilian Designer Still Sells
headline.seo: A Sergio Rodrigues Shop Opens in New York
